summary: Underground Nordic home located near Winterhold..
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=aquamarine]
[font=georgia][center]Bellustu[/center][/font][/color][/i][/b]
[center][/center]
[center][b]Located west of Winterhold.
Check images for location[/b][/center]


[center][font=georgia]A Nordic underground Player home with a follower hangout.
[/font][/center]



[font=georgia][center][i]I originally intended to just build a nice cosy starter home, but then decided to expand it further for somewhere I can put all my follower's when not using them. I could then choose from a housefull of follower's for my skyrim adventuring.. :D
For the full intent of this Player home I would [b][u]recommend[/u][/b] using the following 2 mods as they are the ones I use and like. Or any mod that does the same thing.
Although not a requirement, without them the Follower room will be quite dull and the npc's that hang out there may go nuts with boredeom :P...[/i][/center][/font]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045]My Home Is Your Home[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower overhaul[/url][/center]

[center][font=georgia][u][b]Features the usual player home content:[/b][/u][/font][/center]

[font=georgia][center]Crafting stations
Storage
Bookcases
Mannequins
Weapon Racks/Plaques
Display case's
2 Merchant's[/center][/font]


[center][font=georgia]Install,
Use NMM to download and install...
..or download manually and unpack contents into ..Skyrim/Data[/font][/center]

updating?
*Manual,
Unpack contents into..Skyrim/Data.. folder. overwrite? yes.
*NMM,
Deactivate then delete mod then install new file.
author: Thorsaken
